name: Man-O-Barrel
description:
:

Man O' Barrel is pixel art survival crafting game, this current version is short gameplay demo, created in 7day with small team. This is story of Daniel O'Connor an Adventurer who accidentally hijacked by pirates when going to his new adventure, after several day floating around inside a barrel, Daniel stranded to mysterious islands, you must help daniel to survive on that island before something bad happen.

Currently Game Features: 

  1. Day Night System
  2. Crafting System
  3. Gathering System
  4. Multiple Ending
